title: Can you get unbanned from permaban?
body:
Listen up, I screwed up, I really did. It has been over 4 months since my main account got permaban for toxicity and I really wondered if there's any possible way for it to get unbanned? I can do anything it gets to get it unbanned, no joke!

So please, can a Riot employee answer my question, can I get a permabanned account unbanned?

replies.body: Once an account reaches the point where it needs to be permabanned, it's not very likely to be able to have that lifted. If you want more context on what happened, feel free to reach out to us in a ticket.

the max a ban should be is a year, makes no sense to perma ban people, your pretty much just saying people dont change, if they continously continue to int feed then just keep them perma banned everyone needs more then enough chances especially in this modern day
You may send a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) to Riot Support to get in contact with them and checking if your accoun can get an unban.
can i get unbanned from my main, i know i messed up and from that i learned my lesson u would just wondering how i can work this out if there is a way to talk.
